Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْمَالِ مَا اسْتُرِقَّ بِهِ الْأَحْرَارُ
enWisdom: The best wealth is that by which the freemen become enthralled

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْأَمْوَالِ مَا اسْتُرِقَّ بِهِ الرِّجَالُ
enWisdom: The best of all wealth is that by which men become enthralled

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْمَالِ مَا قُضِيَتْ بِهِ الْحُقُوقُ
enWisdom: The best wealth is that by which the rights [of others] are fulfilled

Wisdom: إِنَّ خَيْرَ الْمَالِ مَا أَوْرَثَكَ ذُخْراً وَذِكْراً وَأَكْسَبَكَ حَمْداً وَأَجْراً
enWisdom: Verily the best wealth is that which bequeaths to you a provision [for the Hereafter] and a legacy, and earns you praise and reward

Wisdom: إِنَّ خَيْرَ الْمَالِ مَا كَسَبَ [أَكْسَبَ‏] ثَنَاءً وَشُكْراً وَأَوْجَبَ ثَوَاباً وَأَجْراً
enWisdom: Verily the best wealth is that which earns praise and gratitude and brings about reward and recompense

Wisdom: أَنْفَعُ الْمَالِ مَا قُضِيَ بِهِ الْفَرْضُ
enWisdom: The most beneficial wealth is that by which the obligatory is fulfilled

Wisdom: أَزْكَى الْمَالِ مَا اشْتُرِيَ بِهِ الْآخِرَةُ
enWisdom: The purest wealth is that with which the Hereafter is bought
The best wealth is that which has the best effect upon you
The best wealth is that which enthrals a freeman
When you become the owner [of a slave], then emancipate [him]
The best of your wealth is that which safeguards your dignity

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأَمْوَالِ مَا أَعَانَ عَلَى الْمَكَارِمِ
enWisdom: The best wealth is that which helps one perform noble deeds
The best of your wealth is that which suffices you
